response.original_title: Survive This! Ghosts Of Pirate Island
response.overview: Two teams of determined competitors embark on the adventure of a lifetime. Now they must compete against one another to win 10 Million dollars on Pirate Island, but the creation of this hot new series soon becomes a bloody nightmare as the whole crew finds out the islands dark secret the hard way.
response.title: Survive This! Ghosts Of Pirate Island
